content.query:
CREATE TABLE [tino].[Streaming]
(
    UniqueOrderID NVARCHAR,
    UniqueMovieID NVARCHAR,
    UniqueCustomerID NVARCHAR,

    SourceID NVARCHAR,
    TransactionID NVARCHAR NULL,
    MovieID NVARCHAR,
    CustomerID NVARCHAR,

    StreamStart DATETIME NULL,
    StreamEnd DATETIME NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (UniqueOrderID),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
